dcterms:creator: M. Patacchiola
A. Cangelosi
dcterms:description: The Deepgaze algorithm is used for head pose estimation, leveraging state-of-the-art methods such as a pre-trained Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to infer the cognitive availability of the operator.
dcterms:title: Deepgaze algorithm

dcterms:description: OpenSesame is an open-source graphical experiment builder used for the secondary task in the experiment, allowing participants to engage in cognitive tasks.
dcterms:title: OpenSesame

dcterms:creator: G. Ganis
R. Kievit
dcterms:description: A set of three-dimensional shapes used for investigating mental rotation processes, validated for use in cognitive tasks.
dcterms:title: Three-Dimensional Shapes for Investigating Mental Rotation Processes
